name: indelicate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Indelicate words or actions are not suitable for a situation and are likely to be offensive: an indelicate commentit is indelicate to Would it be indelicate to mention the fee at this point?

Add to word list
Add to word list
showing a lack of awareness of socially correct behavior: There was an embarrassed silence after his indelicate remark about her age.
